about_the_game:
Enter the Shadows of Harda

The kingdom of Harda has thrived for centuries under the benevolent rule of the Houser family. But an insidious corruption now creeps out of Wick Cave, threatening to plunge the land into chaos. Monsters, driven by malevolent forces, have begun to emerge, their dark influence spreading fear and destruction. The kingdom's soldiers hold the line, but mere defense cannot save Harda. A hero is needed—someone fearless enough to confront the source of the evil and uncover the secrets buried in the shadows.

Face the Unknown

Amrak's invasion is an enigma, shrouded in mystery and cloaked in terror. How did it happen? Why now? And most importantly, how can it be stopped? These are the questions you, as a battle-hardened mercenary, must answer. But you won’t journey alone. As you explore the haunting depths of Wick Cave and the labyrinthine underworld, you’ll uncover secrets that could reshape the future—or doom Harda forever.

A World of Danger and Intrigue

Navigate a perilous world where every choice matters. From intense, skill-driven battles to the whispered clues hidden in forgotten relics and cryptic notes, every moment tests your resolve. Your actions will shape the story, influence the land's fate, and determine if Harda will ever find peace again. Are you ready to carve your legacy in blood and fire?

Key Features

  • Endless Labyrinthine Dungeons: Dive into procedurally generated dungeons that evolve with every run. No two adventures are the same, offering fresh challenges and new rewards with every descent.
  • Epic Boss Encounters: Face off against terrifying bosses, each with unique mechanics and strategies. Only the cunning and prepared will survive these monumental battles.
  • Treasures of the Deep: Discover a vast trove of randomized loot. From enchanted weapons to mystical armor, equip your mercenary with the gear needed to tackle the dungeon’s fiercest foes.
  • Build Your Hero: Create powerful builds using hundreds of divine blessings, unlocking synergies that redefine your approach with every run. Adapt to overcome evolving challenges.
  • Risk Versus Reward: Seek out rare and powerful relics—but beware. The more you desire, the stronger your enemies become. Will you embrace the risk?
  • Customizable Mercenary: Forge your path as a unique hero. Equip gear scavenged from the depths to define your playstyle and overcome the deadly trials that await.
  • Deep Narrative Lore: Unearth the tragic history of Harda and the dark forces behind its plight by piecing together notes, artifacts, and environmental clues. Every discovery pulls you deeper into the story.
  • Immersive Visuals: Experience a striking blend of low-poly 3D and pixel art, enhanced with stop-motion-style animations for a nostalgic yet fresh aesthetic.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of stylized fantasy violence.

short_description: Uncover the dark secrets of Wick Cave and save the kingdom of Harda. Face procedurally generated dungeons, epic bosses, and relentless challenges. Customize your gear, craft unique builds, and shape the fate of the land in this thrilling dungeon crawler. Will you rise as Harda’s hero?
